solution_line_template: First find the total time Karen spending grooming Rottweilers: {rottweiler_groom_time} minutes/Rottweiler * {num_rottweilers} Rottweilers = <<{rottweiler_groom_time}*{num_rottweilers}={total_time_rottweilers}>>{total_time_rottweilers} minutes

Then find the total time she spends grooming border collies: {border_collie_groom_time} minutes/border collie * {num_border_collies} border collies = <<{border_collie_groom_time}*{num_border_collies}={total_time_border_collies}>>{total_time_border_collies} minutes

Then add the time spent grooming all three kinds of dogs to find her total grooming time: {total_time_rottweilers} minutes + {total_time_border_collies} minutes + {chihuahua_groom_time} minutes = <<{total_time_rottweilers}+{total_time_border_collies}+{chihuahua_groom_time}={total_grooming_time}>>{total_grooming_time} minutes
